actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to provide for the establishment of a memorial at the National Arboretum to Benjamin Henry Boneval Latrobe.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to provide for the establishment of a memorial at the National Arboretum to Benjamin Henry Boneval Latrobe. Provides for the use of columns removed from the east central portico of the Capitol Building in such memorial.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the establishment of a memorial at the National Arboretum to Benjamin Henry Boneval Latrobe.
